eu.mondo.mondix.live

Interface ILiveQueryInstance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IQueryInstance
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILiveQueryInstanceDirect<Row>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiveNullaryQueryInstance, LiveQueryInstance, LiveUnaryQueryInstance

    public interface ILiveQueryInstance
extends IQueryInstance
    A query instance that can deliver live info about its changes through callbacks.
    Author:
    Bergmann Gabor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(IChangeCallback changeListener)
      The given listener will be notified of changes from now on.
      IChangeAwareMondixRelation getBaseRelation()
      The base relation which is seeded by this query instance.
      void removeChangeListener(IChangeCallback changeListener)
      The given listener will no longer be notified of changes from now on.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.mondo.mondix.core.IQueryInstance

        dispose, getAllTuples, getCountOfTuples, getFilter, getSelectedColumnNames

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseRelation

        IChangeAwareMondixRelation getBaseRelation()
        Description copied from interface: IQueryInstance
        The base relation which is seeded by this query instance.
        Specified by:
        getBaseRelation in interface IQueryInstance

      • addChangeListener

        void addChangeListener(IChangeCallback changeListener)
        The given listener will be notified of changes from now on. The change listener will have to be removed before disposing the query instance.

      • removeChangeListener

        void removeChangeListener(IChangeCallback changeListener)
        The given listener will no longer be notified of changes from now on.
